caption.p: (A) Scattered lymphocytes, tissue cells, mesothelial cells, and individual atypical cells (H&E staining: original magnification ×100). (B) Epithelioid tumor cells distributed in nests and sheets around fibers and blood vessels; some of the cells have transparent cytoplasm with nuclear division (H&E staining: original magnification ×100). (C) PD-L1 control (H&E staining: original magnification ×100). (D) PD-L1-negative staining.
